# FreeCube Security Policy
> FreeCube is free sofware, the source code can be freely audited by anyone who wishes.

Security is extremely important to this organization, as such, a security policy is in place.

If any security issues are found in the source code, an issue should be raised immediately. Security issues are extremely high priority and will be fixed as soon as possible.

If *you* can fix the issue, please do, and open up a PR request with the fixes when it's ready. Security is our highest priority here!
